name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander has a flame on its tail, which burns brightly as its mood changes.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle's shell is not just for protection. Its round shape minimizes resistance in water.

name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu stores electricity in its cheeks for zapping an enemy if threatened.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff's vocal cords allow it to sing lullabies that cause its enemies to fall asleep.

name: Meowth
description: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to silently sneak up on its prey.

name: Psyduck
description: Psyduck uses psychic powers, but it cannot remember doing so, leaving it puzzled.

name: Machop
description: Machop's muscles never tire, no matter how much it exercises.

name: Gengar
description: Gengar hides in shadows. It absorbs the warmth of those around it to create a chill.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment.

name: Snorlax
description: Snorlax only wakes up to eat and barely moves unless it has consumed 900 pounds of food.

name: Mewtwo
description: Mewtwo was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering.
